articles.title: Microsoft confirms latest Patch Tuesday updates causes authorization issues - Neowin
articles.description: Microsoft has updated the Windows Health Dashboard documentation with a notice about a new known issue that causes authentication failures on the server or client for various services.
articles.content: It appears that the latest cumulative update for Windows 11 and 10 did not go as smoothly as Microsoft wanted. Following reports about all sorts of issues and crashes happening after installing the M… [+1173 chars]
